name: Simayaa Technologies
overview:
Simayaa Technologies is a fast growing global creative web design, web development, IT consulting and outsourcing company with business offices located at India and USA. We work closely in developing effective outsourcing partnerships with clients such as you in order to reduce their IT costs, enhanced productivity and maximize ROI(Return On Investment). We are expertise in: 1) Web Development We build websites using WordPress, Drupal, Joomla and Magento. 2) Web Design We create functional web design keeping latest design trends in mind. Apart from web design we do high quality graphic design including Logos, Brochures, Infographics etc. 3) Responsive Web Design (HTML5/CSS3): We optimize websites for mobile and smart devices. Apart from Responsive Web design, we do normal PSD to XHTML and email newsletter coding.
To know more about our services, please check our below sites: www.cssrockers.com www.hireresponsivewebdesigners.com http://www.hirepsddesigners.com/ www.simayaa.com
